name: Fisnik Canaj
summary: Front‑end Developer with 8+ years of experience specialising in JavaScript and Angular frameworks. Proficient in designing efficient architectures and implementing performance optimisations. Skilled in creating visually appealing and user‑friendly applications. Collaborative, delivery‑focused, and committed to staying current with modern web technologies.
about: Beyond my professional roles, I’ve built side projects like a WordPress news portal with custom automation scripts, a Stripe‑backed gadget rental app, and a 3D chess DApp concept. One of my favourite achievements was helping deliver a Volvo online car‑sales project under a tight deadline, then contributing to a major rewrite of CSGORoll using modern Angular and state management.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: CSGORoll – Developed betting experiences with Angular 16/17, GraphQL/Apollo, NgRx, and RxJS.
Created a favourites module and uplifted stability and performance across high-traffic flows.
Partnered with design to refine UI/UX while coordinating with cross-functional squads.
Hypedrop – Delivered admin login, password reset, and account journeys using Qwik, GraphQL, Builder.io, and Tailwind CSS.

experience.title: Frontend/Angular Developer
bullets: Extended Volvo’s online car purchase module for regional sales journeys.
Added new experiences to the Cisco Health Care platform with partner teams.
Improved Service Plan reliability with Cypress coverage and NX-driven Angular upgrades.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Shipped UX improvements and mobile optimisations across marketing pages.
Built reusable Vue.js components with Sass, Webpack, and Laravel integrations.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Delivered an Angular booking application with lazy loading and modular routing.
Built complex reservation forms for E-Dea and integrated with backend APIs.
Crafted SPA patterns that balanced performance and maintainability.

experience.title: Frontend UI Developer
bullets: Built UI components, filtering interfaces, and chart visualisations for the process mining platform.
Worked across Angular, Sass, and vanilla JavaScript to improve usability.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Completed an internship project using HTML, CSS/Bootstrap, and PHP to improve civic data access.

experience.title: UI Developer
bullets: Enhanced UI design execution with JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML, and CSS.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Self-taught through React, Vue, Angular, and Python projects, focusing on clean front-end builds.
Delivered portfolios for clients while sharpening algorithm and data-structure fundamentals.
